additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance, Sodium Citrate, Dimethiconol, Piroctone Olamine, Dimethicone, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Salicylate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Trideceth-10, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Propylene Glycol

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If in eyes, rinse well with water
